extendedInfo.description: Soaring through the chaotic sky during World War II, the paratrooper, under your control, must attempt to reach the battleground down below! 8 unique and powerful weapons are at your disposal including a mini gun, laser gun, rocket launcher, and much more! Collect gems and coins to use at the store to buy power ups and more guns. Upon landing, kamikazes will attempt to kill you as a huge gunship arrives. Experience all of this for only 0.99 cents!âExciting gameplay!âAstounding graphics!âEpic music and sound effects!âTons of weapons and power ups!âEasy to learn, but hard to master!âOnly 0.99 cents!

reviews.title: Extremely fun!
reviews.comment: I enjoyed this app a lot there was plenty of game play hours enough to be worth 2$ overall I definately recommend
reviews.author: Alec Hall

reviews.title: Addictive!
reviews.comment: Its a great app to fill time with, great gameplay and graphics
reviews.author: Chuck hall
